caption.p: Leaf dimensions of Phania matricarioides collected from different geographical localities in Cuba. PmB: collected in Bauta, Artemisa Province, Cuba; PmC: collected in Cangrejeras, Artemisa Province, Cuba; PmI: collected in gardens of the Faculty of Pharmacy and Foods, La Lisa, Havana Province, Cuba. Results are the means with standard deviations of 100 leaves obtained from 20 plant samples from each area.
